Bernie Sanders said Barack Obama should have expected Erskine Bowles and Alan Simpson would recommend raising the retirement age. That wasn't an accident, he said. "When you appoint people, you know what you're going to get." The commission issued a final proposal in December that called for increasing the retirement age to 68 by 2050

"She's making progress every day," Kirsten Gillibrand said. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing. So... it's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury that she did.
